item.title: Everything I was wrong about Event Sourcing
item.description: Many years ago, I implemented a system based on the concept of Event Sourcing. Years later, I realised my understanding of Event Sourcing had been wrong this whole time. I decided to write up this article to summerise everything I was wrong about Event Sourcing. Event vs State The very first thing i was wrong about Event Sourcing is how I understood the definition of Event Sourcing.
